"Task Quest": Design an immersive, augmented reality experience that transforms task completion into a thrilling adventure. Users wear AR glasses and embark on a virtual quest, completing tasks to progress through levels, defeat virtual enemies, and collect rewards.

"Task Symphony": Develop a musical instrument that generates music based on task completion. Users earn "notes" for completing tasks, which are then played on a virtual instrument.
